availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John G. Paton (Deputy Bourbon Co Circuit Court Clerk)

body.p: Bourbon County, Kentucky, deputy circuit clerk. Kentucky native. Son of James Paton and Elizabeth Paton. Resident of Bourbon County, Kentucky, in 1850. Deputy clerk of Bourbon Circuit Court in Bourbon County from 1860 to 1865.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bourbon County, District 2, p. 256A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bourbon County, p. 522.
Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1861, Legislative Document Series, No. 1 (Frankfort, KY: Jno. B. Major, State Printer, 1862), 305.
Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1864, Legislative Document Series, No. 1 (Frankfort, KY: George D. Prentice, State Printer, 1865), 11.
KYR-0001-020-1454.
